experience.description:
Backend development: Integrated RAG for improved AI results in IuclidAssist, public/private beta system
implemented with user validation and manual admin approval, fixed GitHub login, added cost estimation
and updated APIs/models, tested and implemented changes based on requirements.
• Frontend and Documentation: Implemented Firebase login and a custom tag in Docusaurus (visible only
to SilverBrain users). Contributed to the project’s documentation.
• Deployment: Maintained projects on AWS EC2 using Portainer, updated credentials, and ensured
container stability.

Frontend development using Vue.js and Naive-UI, backend development with PHP and Laravel, Linux
server management and maintenance, Nexus configuration for repository management, Nginx setup and
configuration for web serving, replicated HP IMC 7’s basic features using Three.js.

Mobile app UI development with Flutter, web scraping (Beautiful Soup 4, requests, Playwright), and data
integration with OpenAI and Google Vision APIs.
NLP tasks using Python (Transformers, PyTorch), data acquisition and vectorization, and UI development with Gradio.
Assisted students with C programming in CTIS151 and CTIS152 labs, providing guidance and solutions.

education.school: Bilkent University, Information Systems and Technologies
education.description:
Projects: Petiary: Pet tracking app written with java and swing GUI; Portfolio Website: Personal portfolio:
HTML, CSS, JavaScript used;Words ofWonders Game: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript game replica ;
Ahbapol: Basic social media site with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP ; Small Games: Developed games
using C, OpenGL, GLUT, and Java.

education.school: University Of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, Media Communication and Design
education.description: Projects: OpenConferenceDesk: Online meeting system written with React.js, Image processing and classification using OpenCv and scikit-learn.

social.description:
Co-founded a university club aimed at
organizing and reviving traditional games like hide and seek and dodgeball. My responsibilities include
managing club operations, liaising with university administration, and ensuring that all necessary
documentation is accurately submitted.
